content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM offers a diverse workforce that encompasses people from a range of backgrounds. This includes people of different genders, races, nationalities, disabilities, sexual orientations, ages, religions and social backgrounds.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please use the EPAM \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/uk/london/equal-opportunity.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Equal opportunity\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" link to read further.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
